mapper.sql: book_id, title, author, publisher, category_id, `status`, shelf_location
mapper.select: SELECT b.title AS bookName, COUNT(DISTINCT bb.borrow_id) AS borrowCount, COUNT(DISTINCT ret.return_id) AS returnCount FROM books b LEFT JOIN book_borrow bb ON b.book_id = bb.book_id LEFT JOIN book_return ret ON b.book_id = ret.book_id GROUP BY b.book_id, b.title, b.author ORDER BY borrowCount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(book_id) FROM books b WHERE b.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND b.create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59');

SELECT b.*, c.category_name FROM books b LEFT JOIN book_categories c ON b.category_id = c.category_id
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND b.flag = 0
ORDER BY b.create_time DESC

WITH daily_borrow AS (SELECT CASE DAYNAME(borrow_date) WHEN 'Monday' THEN '周一' WHEN 'Tuesday' THEN '周二' WHEN 'Wednesday' THEN '周三' WHEN 'Thursday' THEN '周四' WHEN 'Friday' THEN '周五' WHEN 'Saturday' THEN '周六' WHEN 'Sunday' THEN '周日' END AS borrow_day, COUNT(*) AS borrow_count FROM book_borrow WHERE YEARWEEK(borrow_date) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE()) GROUP BY borrow_day), daily_return AS (SELECT CASE DAYNAME(create_time) WHEN 'Monday' THEN '周一' WHEN 'Tuesday' THEN '周二' WHEN 'Wednesday' THEN '周三' WHEN 'Thursday' THEN '周四' WHEN 'Friday' THEN '周五' WHEN 'Saturday' THEN '周六' WHEN 'Sunday' THEN '周日' END AS return_day, COUNT(*) AS return_count FROM book_return WHERE YEARWEEK(create_time) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE()) GROUP BY return_day) SELECT day, COALESCE(db.borrow_count, 0) AS borrow_count, COALESCE(dr.return_count, 0) AS return_count FROM (SELECT '周一' AS day UNION ALL SELECT '周二' UNION ALL SELECT '周三' UNION ALL SELECT '周四' UNION ALL SELECT '周五' UNION ALL SELECT '周六' UNION ALL SELECT '周日') AS d LEFT JOIN daily_borrow db ON d.day = db.borrow_day LEFT JOIN daily_return dr ON d.day = dr.return_day ORDER BY FIELD(day, '周一', '周二', '周三', '周四', '周五', '周六', '周日')
